articles.title: Scott Galloway forecasts next AI impact on American jobs
articles.description: The New York University professor and author explains key facts on new technology and its effect on people's lives.
articles.content:
Key Points
Initial reports suggest AI has little workforce impact, but history warns of significant job disruptions.
Scott Galloway notes recent mass layoffs and predicts who AI will target next.
Workers should develop future-proof, human-centric ski... [5254 chars]

articles.title: Backed Mininglamp Technology Doubles in Hong Kong Debut
articles.description: Tencent-Backed Mininglamp Technology Doubles in Hong Kong Debut - The SaaS provider, backed by Tencent and Temasek, saw its market capitalization reach nearly HK$42 billion ($5.4 billion) after its shares surged over 100%
articles.content:
Shares of Mininglamp Technology, an artificial intelligence-driven software provider backed by Tencent Holdings Ltd., more than doubled in their Hong Kong trading debut Monday.
The stock closed at HK$290.6, a 106.1% surge from its issue price of HK$1... [428 chars]

articles.title: New EPOS Impact 500 Native Bluetooth Headset Is Powered By AI And BrainAdapt Technology
articles.description: EPOS specializes in headsets for office workers. The latest Impact 500 model uses BrainAdapt technology and EPOS AI to make workers feel more productive and comfortable.
articles.content:
Denmark’s EPOS has revealed its latest wireless headset aimed at office and call center workers looking for comfort, noise canceling, and a bit of future proofing thanks to the newest version of the Bluetooth wireless protocol.
The EPOS Impact 500 is... [4336 chars]

articles.content: Durham, NC and Los Baños, Philippines, Nov. 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Pairwise has licensed its Fulcrum® gene editing platform to the International Rice Research Institute (IRRI), a non-profit agricultural research organization. The agreement will... [3354 chars]

articles.title: With $100 bn war chest, KKR to set aside a huge share for India play
articles.description: KKR is set to boost its India investments significantly. The firm plans to deploy substantial capital in the country as part of its global expansion. Focus areas include healthcare, consumer, technology, financial services, and infrastructure like renewables and data centres. Manufacturing is also a key target. KKR is also bringing its insurance business to India, funding local transactions.
articles.content:

articles.title: PM Modi launches RDI Fund to spur private investment in research
articles.description:
n delhi bureau and agencies
new delhi, nov 3
prime minister narendra modi on monday launched the rs one lakh crore rdi fund to promote private sector investments in research and development.
he launched the research, development and innovation (rdi) fund at the first ever emerging science technology and innovation conclave (estic) that brings together policy makers, innovators and global visionaries to drive the government’s viksit bharat 2047 vision.
modi also launched a coffee table book on scientif
articles.content:
Delhi Bureau and Agencies
NEW DELHI
PRIME Minister Narendra Modi on Monday launched the Rs one lakh crore RDI Fund to promote private sector investments in research and development. He launched the Research, Development and Innovation (RDI) Fund at t... [1126 chars]
